text: <@U026E0ZNR>: can you let me know the minimum resolution needed for the images for the intro screen?
I'm pretty sure I sent you an email a week or so with all that info. Do you still have it?
I have pixels. Mark's specifically asking for the min resolution...
If he's referring to the PPI, that should be 72ppi by default.
so min res would be 640x480 pixels?
motion demo on NAS: clients > OMSI > Current Science > Dev > WIP demos > more like this.mov

<!channel> I'm headed out of town early tomorrow morning, if you need anything from me I'll be able to respond to emails  or jump on a call. I will have my laptop with me. my code is all pushed to bitbucket.
I have the repo down and I think I understand what I'm looking at (:

This is looking great. Happy to see it coming together. I have some color values for press states of these buttons I can ship over to you for when you're ready. Also, how hard is it to implement in/out easing into the movement animations for module windows?
